channel.title: Compiler Error (shophandler)
channel.description:
I edited the items and amounts and I get the error when I run the server(compiling shows no error) heres the file:
//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount
shop = 8 @whi@Dragon_Shop 2 2 1215 2000 1231 2000 1249 2000 1263 2000 1305 2000 1377 2000 1434 2000 3176 2000 3204 2000 4587 2000 5680 2000 5698 2000 5716 2000 5730 2000 7158 2000
shop = 9 @blu@Sardomin_Shop 1 1 2661 1000 2663 1000 2665 1000 2667 1000 2415 1000 3840 1000 2412 1000 1718 1000 4037 1000 4513 1000 4514
shop = 10 @whi@Farming_Shop 2 2 5291 10000 5292 10000 5293 10000 5294 8000 5295 10000 5296 10000 5297 10000 5298 10000 5299 10000 5300 10000 5301 10000 5302 10000 5303 10000 5304 10000
The error began when I edited the 9th shop(sara shop) I removed the other shops so the file wouldnt get to big, I left 2 shops on because I tought it might help.
Heres the compiler error: [img]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/4189/compiler2rl8.jpg[/img]
Any1 know a solution?

item.title: Compiler Error (shophandler)
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Check for spaces. ALWAYS use Tab, never ever space, it will cause a error in running.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error (shophandler)
